titles.title: O Love That Will Not Let Me Go

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O love that will not let me go, newline I rest my weary soul in Thee. newline I give Thee back the life I owe, newline That in Thine ocean depths its flow, newline May richer fuller be.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: O light that foll'west all my way, newline I yield my flick'ring torch to Thee. newline My heart restores its borrowed ray, newline That in Thy sunshine's blaze it's day, newline May brighter fairer be.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O joy that seekest me through pain, newline I cannot close my heart to Thee. newline I trace the rainbow through the rain, newline And feel the promise is not vain, newline That morn shall tearless be.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O cross that lifted up my head, newline I dare not ask to fly from Thee. newline I lay in dust life's glory dead, newline And from the ground there blossoms red, newline Life that shall endless be.
